message.text: Call our support team at 9876543210 or +919123456789 immediately. Your account number 1234567890123 needs verification.

conversationHistory.text: Hello, this is ICICI Bank customer care. Your account will be blocked within 1 hour due to KYC verification pending.
Why will my account be blocked?
Please send payment of Rs. 500 to verify your account at fraudster@paytm UPI ID. Also update your details at http://fake-icici-bank.com/verify
